messages.subject: Fwd: Snow Days at Scholastic Book Fairs —Extended Warehouse Event Dates
messages.msgSnippet: SWEET! I went yesterday but I think I will be going back. I also walked in filled out my postcard and no one asked for ID. $10.00 off 50.00 or more! Laura
messages.messageBody:
SWEET! I went yesterday but I think I will be going back. I also walked in
filled out my postcard and no one asked for ID. $10.00 off 50.00 or more! Laura
****************************************************************
In a message dated 12/17/2003 2:44:39 PM Eastern Standard Time,
intranet@... writes:
Dear ,

Due to the recent inclement weather, we are extending our Customer
Appreciation Warehouse Sales Events three more days!

1000抯 of terrific products to choose from!
Hurry in and get great deals on Books, Software,
Teacher Resources, and many other products.

****************************************************************************
Receive $10.00* off the already reduced 50% off price on orders of $50.00 or
more.

*Offer only valid at locations listed below during the following dates:
Saturday, December 20
Monday, December 22
Tuesday, December 23
Email must be presented for additional discount.
(Print this e-mail and bring it with you for your discount.)

*****************************************************************************

EXTENDED DAYS AND HOURS OF OPERATION:

Saturday, December 20, 10 amm
Monday and Tuesday, December 22 10 amm


Great deals on books for gifts during the holidays and throughout the year.
Stock up at one of these locations:

Marlborough, MA
360 Cedar Hill Street, STE 1
Marlborough, Massachusetts 01752
800-526-3343 508-229-0000

Saco, ME
33 Springhill Road
Saco, Maine 04072
800-479-2395 207-286-9926

Amherst, NY
405 Crosspoint PKY, STE 100
Amherst, New York 14068
888-300-3918 716-639-1404

E. Syracuse, NY
5717 Enterprise PKY
E Syracuse, New York 13057
800-648-1662 315-449-1123

Williston, VT
45 Krupp Drive
Williston, Vermont 05495
888-900-9364 802-859-9364


These events are not open to the public and are exclusively for:

Teachers School Administrators
Librarians Book Fair Chairpeople
School Personnel Book Fair Volunteers
Homeschoolers (with verification)**


For directions and other Customer Appreciation Events nearest
you, please check our Web site at
http://www.scholastic.com/bookfairs/warehouse.

Wishing you happy holidays,

Scholastic Book Fairs

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------
**To participate in Scholastic抯 Customer Appreciation Warehouse Sales Events
as a homeschooler, please bring one of the following pieces of documentation
to the event in your city:
1. A valid membership card from your homeschool support group.
2. A copy of your state抯 affidavit or annual registration document that
confirms you have registered your child as a homeschooler in your state.
3. A document that verifies that your child is part of either a homeschool
charter school, public virtual academy or distance learning private school such
as; a weekly attendance record with your child抯 name on it, or letter from the
school or your Educational Specialist verifying that your child is a current
student.
